title: Bug 11866: Label Issues in Update Test Suite Dialog
description: The Update Test Suite dialog has label issues.
OB:
The observed issues in the Update Test Suite dialog include:
- The label "Test Classes to be included" is written as "TestClasses" without a space.
- The status line incorrectly refers to methods being selected instead of types.
- The action name is written as "TestSuite" without a space, instead of "Test Suite."
EB:
The expected behavior is that the labels in the Update Test Suite dialog should be correctly written and formatted as follows:
- The label "Test Classes to be included" should include a space and be written as it is.
- The status line should correctly refer to types being selected, not methods.
- The action name should be written as "Test Suite" with a space.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the incorrect labels and descriptions as mentioned in the observed behavior.
